bill.title: Financial Improvements to Real Property
bill.description: Authorizes residential or commercial property owner to apply to local government for funding to finance improvement; provides non-ad valorem assessment on commercial property is subject to fee; requires delinquent assessment with nongovernmental lessee to be enforced in manner provided by law; specifies requirements of financing agreement for government commercial property; authorizes financing agreement to be executed for commercial property; limits amount of non-ad valorem assessment for residential property; provides exception relating to non-ad valorem assessment for residential property that is supported by energy audit; revises seller's disclosure statement for certain properties offered for sale.
